newsitem.title: RUSSIA: ZAO CB Trust wins 29.3 pct in Russia Komitek.
newsitem.headline: ZAO CB Trust wins 29.3 pct in Russia Komitek.

text.p: Unknown Russian company ZAO CB Trust won a tender for a 29.3 percent stake in the Komitek oil holding company, a source at the tender committee said on Monday.

The source said that the bid still needed to be signed by the acting chairman of the Komi Property Fund, which organised the auction, but that this was a formality. He also said that the bid was guaranteed by the National Reserve Bank.
OAO Neftyanaya Kompaniya Komitek's main oil production unit is AO Komineft.
Foreign investors were not allowed to take part in the tender, the Federal Property Fund said late in March.
Komitek produced 3.26 million tonnes of crude oil (65,200 barrels per day) in 1996, not including joint venture output, down from 5.17 million (103,400 bpd) in 1995.
Production last year including joint venture production was 8.23 million tonnes (164,600 bpd).
